thread.title: Chris Dendrinos
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Chris Dendrinos

author: Chris Dendrinos
title: Chris Dendrinos
text: Came to the store twice and was greeted both times. The 2nd time I worked with Becky who was incredibly helpful and took the time to figure out what I wanted more than just make a sale (great saleswoman thought!). Very happy overall.
